Articles.Content:
Is there a PartModule method that can be overridden, or a callback that can be registered, such that your code is notified when a tweakable value is changed on your part?

Failing that, I suppose you can just poll to check if the value has changed from its previous value, but... is there a good method to check that from? I tried sticking something in OnUpdate only to realize OnUpdate is only called in flight, whereas I need this to happen in the editor.

EDIT: Okay, if you define a method called Update, it will get called in the editor much like OnUpdate does in flight. Still would love a callback for tweakable value changes, but this works for now... [Next problem: how to force the right-click menu to redraw. EDIT: Also solved. Thanks FlowerChild]

Edited March 12, 2014 by Gaius
